attributes.action: make Stamp Duty fairer for normal people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many first time buyers are hit with the 3% stamp duty charge designed to punish/tax luxury homes, although in many areas there are no suitable properties under £250k.

A fairer system could have a flat 1% rate for main homes and higher rates for second homes and buy-to-let investments.  Alternatively, regional thresholds could be set.
